data.text: @UFT Lori Rosen building 24 , Phys ed teacher Child molested ex girlfriends child . She also abuses her dog . Kicks him in the head she sick
@UFT What science is this based on? It’s not because you continue to get federal covid funds if you keep the kids masked is it?

@UFT So stupid! This policy should go for indoors as well! The kids are the lowest risk category. I bet theres atleast one UFT member here that goes to indoor venues without a mask. Hypocrites at their best. Hope your union collapses. Your punishing our kids!

@UFT Does this also include taking students temperature with those touch thermometers that only work 25% of the time in cold weather? Kind of defeats the purpose of trying to keep the students without a fever out of the building.  In all fairness though, the optics LOOK impressive.
@UFT Hoping our air filters from the purifiers in thr classroom have been changed when we come back. I had to bring it up during our Feb. consultation meeting again.
@safeschoolsny @UFT @ufcuft I’m sure those kids were fine 24 hours later. If not 5 minutes later.
@UFT UFT - still pushing as hard as possible for mask. Even when no medical agency claims there’s need to. You really want to keep our kids mute and unseen..
@UFT What? Uh Not It's Not. We all know damn well that the DOE has no adequate safety evaluation. Smdh
@UFT It’s okay to take the masks off now.
